CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 9, 1954, page 17, reads: "Taking Oath - Common Pleas Court Judge Walter P. Smart administers the oath of office as Mayor David L. Lawrence looks on."
TitMainTitle: Paul Jones with right hand raised, Pittsburgh Mayor David L. Lawrence in center, and Common Pleas Court Judge Walter P. Smart, standing in Pittsburgh City Council Chambers with carved eagle and United States flags at the City County Building
